_header: Complain I would wist I whom til
_description: William Dunbar, ‘A Complaint to the King’ — 76 lines, in couplets

CULLl510.First Lines:
Complane I wald wist I quham tillor vnto quham direct my
                    bill…
CULLl510.Last Lines:
…Bot eftir danger cumes graceAs hes bein hard in mony
                    place

CamMagPep2553.First Lines:
Complane I wald wist I quhome tillOr wnto quhome darett my
                    bill…
CamMagPep2553.Last Lines:
…Bot efter danger cumis graceAs hes bein herd in mony
                    place
